nodes.text: Aril Kyak was a female Sullustan who was the wife of Syub Kyak and the mother of Fiev Kyak and Sien Kyak. During the Clone Wars, she and her family traveled to the Cularin system for a vacation and hired the space yacht Crest of Dawn from Cularin Star Tours to travel around the system in. However, her children rewired some of the ship's controls and it became stuck in a radiation storm on Genarius. The CST safety ship Starchaser IV arrived and managed the save Aril and the rest of her family.
